1370: Folpertus moved to Op 't Speuy.A.9 after marriage.
Got married to Ermerut at age 25 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Ermerut, Folpertus, at age 27.
1373: Had a daughter with Ermerut, Nimme, at age 28.
1375: Had a son with Ermerut, Hildebrandus, at age 30.
1376: Had a son with Ermerut, Stephanus, at age 31.
1380: Had a son with Ermerut, Hughe, at age 35.
1381: Had a son with Ermerut, Blomart, at age 36.
1382: Became caretaker of Folpertus, Nimme, Hildebrandus, Stephanus, Hughe, Blomart at age 38.
1386: Lost son Hildebrandus when Hildebrandus was 12 years old.
